name: Satoru's Love Story
description:
You download an amazing visual novel with beautiful pixel graphics and the most original story your best friend has sent, the game is about Satoru, an ordinary student looking for love. But everything will not go as planned...

For the best experience. We recommend downloading the PC version of this visual novel. WebGL version will have 'Development Build' text sadly.

Controls:

Mouse and right mouse button. That is all.
